column5: We are going in Sept., was wonderings what to use? Jig and minnows, casting , etc. Like to buy the stuff in USA not there. Has anyone been there, where to start fishing from the lodge?
LOTS OF JIGS SPINNERS GET A GUIDE FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS WELL WORTH THE CASH PLUS GREAT SHORE LUNCH BEEN THERE 4 TIMES ALWAYS HAD A GREAT TIME EVEN WITH MY WIFE GOOD LUCK
